summary.span: 定義可能應用在多個版本中的元件、型別或型別成員之相容性保障。

span.span: Defines the compatibility guarantee of a component, type, or type member that may span multiple versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的元件和類別庫的開發人員用來表示其程式庫的取用者可以預期在多個版本的相容性層級。The is used by developers of components and class libraries to indicate the level of compatibility that consumers of their libraries can expect across multiple versions. 表示文件庫或元件的未來版本將不會中斷現有的用戶端的保證層的級。It indicates the level of guarantee that a future version of the library or component will not break an existing client. 然後可以使用用戶端為設計自己的介面，以確保穩定性不同版本之間的輔助工具。Clients can then use the as an aid in designing their own interfaces to ensure stability across versions. > [!NOTE] > Common language runtime (CLR) 不以任何方式使用此屬性。The common language runtime (CLR) does not use this attribute in any way. 記載元件作者的意圖在於它的值。Its value lies in formally documenting the intent of the component author. 編譯時期工具也可以使用這些宣告來偵測，否則就會破壞宣告的保證的編譯時期錯誤。Compile-time tools can also use these declarations to detect compile-time errors that would otherwise break the declared guarantee. ## 相容性層級Levels of Compatibility 支援下列層級的相容性，其中的成員都由列舉型別：The supports the following levels of compatibility, which are represented by members of the enumeration: - 任何版本-相容性 ()。No version-to-version compatibility (). 用戶端可以預期未來版本將會中斷現有用戶端。The client can expect that future versions will break the existing client. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 無相容](#None)本主題稍後的章節。For more information, see the [No Compatibility](#None) section later in this topic. - 並排顯示版本-相容性 ()。Side-by-side version-to-version compatibility (). 元件已經過測試，以處理多個版本的組件載入相同的應用程式定義域中時。The component has been tested to work when more than one version of the assembly is loaded in the same application domain. 一般情況下，未來版本可能會中斷相容性。In general, future versions can break compatibility. 不過，重大變更時，舊的版本則不會修改，但與新的版本。However, when breaking changes are made, the old version is not modified but exists alongside the new version. 並排顯示執行是預期的方式進行重大的變更時使用的現有用戶端。Side-by-side execution is the expected way to make existing clients work when breaking changes are made. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 並排顯示相容性](#SideBySide)本主題稍後的章節。For more information, see the [Side-by-Side Compatibility](#SideBySide) section later in this topic. - 穩定版本-相容性 ()。Stable version-to-version compatibility (). 未來的版本應該不會中斷用戶端，並不需要由並行執行。Future versions should not break the client, and side-by-side execution should not be needed. 不過，如果不小心中斷用戶端，它可能使用並排顯示執行來修正此問題。However, if the client is inadvertently broken, it may be possible to use side-by-side execution to fix the problem. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 穩定的相容性](#Standard)一節。For more information, see the [Stable Compatibility](#Standard) section. - Exchange 版本-相容性 ()。Exchange version-to-version compatibility (). 非經常性小心以確保未來的版本不會中斷用戶端。Extraordinary care is taken to ensure that future versions will not break the client. 用戶端應該使用這些型別用來與其他組件部署彼此通訊的介面的簽章中。The client should use only these types in the signature of interfaces that are used for communication with other assemblies that are deployed independently of one another. 只有一個版本的這些類型被必須在指定的應用程式網域中，這表示如果用戶端會中斷，並排顯示執行無法修正相容性問題。Only one version of these types is expected to be in a given application domain, which means that if a client breaks, side-by-side execution cannot fix the compatibility problem. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 交換類型相容性](#Exchange)一節。For more information, see the [Exchange Type Compatibility](#Exchange) section. 下列各節討論每個層級的更詳細的保證。The following sections discuss each level of guarantee in greater detail. ### 不相容性No Compatibility 標示為元件指出提供者，並不保證相容性。Marking a component as indicates that the provider makes no guarantees about compatibility. 用戶端上公開的介面，就應該避免發生任何相依性。Clients should avoid taking any dependencies on the exposed interfaces. 此層級的相容性可用於型別是實驗性或，都公開屬性，但僅供，一定會同時更新的元件。This level of compatibility is useful for types that are experimental or that are publicly exposed but are intended only for components that are always updated at the same time. 明確指出，此元件不應由外部元件。 explicitly indicates that this component should not be used by external components. ### 並排顯示相容性Side-by-Side Compatibility 標示為元件指出元件已經過測試以處理多個版本的組件載入至相同的應用程式定義域時。Marking a component as indicates that the component has been tested to work when more than one version of the assembly is loaded into the same application domain. 重大變更允許只要它們不會對該組件都有更高的版本號碼。Breaking changes are allowed as long as they are made to the assembly that has the greater version number. 繫結至組件的舊版本的元件應繼續繫結至舊的版本，而其他元件可以繫結至新的版本中。Components that are bound to an old version of the assembly are expected to continue to bind to the old version, and other components can bind to the new version. 您也可更新的元件，會宣告為破壞性的方式修改舊的版本。It is also possible to update a component that is declared to be by destructively modifying the old version. ### 穩定的相容性Stable Compatibility 標記類型為表示不同版本之間應該保持穩定的型別。Marking a type as indicates that the type should remain stable across versions. 不過，它也可能型別的穩定存在於相同的應用程式定義域的並排顯示版本。However, it may also be possible for side-by-side versions of a stable type to exist in the same application domain. 穩定的型別會維護高的二進位相容性標準。Stable types maintain a high binary compatibility bar. 因為這個緣故，提供者應該避免對穩定的型別中的重大變更。Because of this, providers should avoid making breaking changes to stable types. 變更下列幾種可接受的：The following kinds of changes are acceptable: - 私用執行個體欄位中加入或移除欄位，為型別，只要這不會中斷的序列化格式。Adding private instance fields to, or removing fields from, a type, as long as this does not break the serialization format. - 非可序列化的類型變更為可序列化的型別。Changing a non-serializable type to a serializable type. （不過，可序列化的型別不能變更為不可序列化的型別）。(However, a serializable type cannot be changed to a non-serializable type.) - 擲回新的、 多衍生的例外狀況的方法。Throwing new, more derived exceptions from a method. - 提升效能的方法。Improving the performance of a method. - 只要變更不會造成不良影響大部分的用戶端，請變更傳回值的範圍。Changing the range of return values, as long as the change does not adversely affect the majority of clients. - 如果業務正當理由很高，而且有不利受影響的用戶端數目不足，請修正嚴重的錯誤。Fixing serious bugs, if the business justification is high and the number of adversely affected clients is low. 因為新版本的穩定的元件不會中斷現有用戶端，通常只有一個版本的穩定的元件需要應用程式定義域中。Because new versions of stable components are not expected to break existing clients, generally only one version of a stable component is needed in an application domain. 不過，這不是必要需求，因為穩定的類型不會用做為已知的 exchange 達成協議的所有元件的型別。However, this is not a requirement, because stable types are not used as well-known exchange types that all components agree upon. 因此，如果穩定的元件的新版本會不小心中斷一些元件，而且需要新版本的其他元件，它可能會載入舊和新元件同時修正此問題。Therefore, if a new version of a stable component does inadvertently break some component, and if other components need the new version, it may be possible to fix the problem by loading both the old and new component. 提供強大的版本相容性保證比。 provides a stronger version compatibility guarantee than . 它是多個版本元件的一般預設值。It is a common default for multi-version components. 可以結合，其指出元件不會中斷相容性，但測試，可指定應用程式定義域中載入多個版本。 can be combined with , which states that the component will not break compatibility but is tested to work when more than one version is loaded in a given application domain. 型別或方法標示為之後，將它升級到。After a type or method is marked as , it can be upgraded to . 不過，它無法降級至。However, it cannot be downgraded to . ### 交換類型相容性Exchange Type Compatibility 標記為類型可提供強大的版本相容性保證比，而且應該套用至所有類型的最穩定。Marking a type as provides a stronger version compatibility guarantee than , and should be applied to the most stable of all types. 這些類型都可以用來跨所有元件界限 （任何版本的 CLR） 或任何版本的元件或應用程式的同時時間獨立建置的元件和空間 （跨處理序、 跨-CLR 中某一個處理序之間的交換跨應用程式定義域中一個 CLR）。These types are intended to be used for interchange between independently built components across all component boundaries in both time (any version of the CLR or any version of a component or application) and space (cross-process, cross-CLR in one process, cross-application domain in one CLR). 如果一項重大變更對交換類型，就無法載入類型的多個版本中修正此問題。If a breaking change is made to an exchange type, it is impossible to fix the issue by loading multiple versions of the type. 問題非常嚴重 （例如嚴重的安全性問題） 或遭破壞的可能性很低 （亦即，如果已經是行為已損毀的程式碼可能不會花費相依性上以隨機方式） 時，才應該變更交換類型。Exchange types should be changed only when a problem is very serious (such as a severe security issue) or the probability of breakage is very low (that is, if the behavior was already broken in a random way that code could not have conceivably taken a dependency on). 您可以將下列幾種變更對交換類型：You can make the following kinds of changes to an exchange type: - 加入新的介面定義繼承。Add inheritance of new interface definitions. - 加入新的私用方法可實作新繼承的介面定義的方法。Add new private methods that implement the methods of newly inherited interface definitions. - 加入新的靜態欄位。Add new static fields. - 加入新的靜態方法。Add new static methods. - 加入新的非虛擬的執行個體方法。Add new non-virtual instance methods. 下列會被視為重大變更，而且不允許的基本型別：The following are considered breaking changes and are not allowed for primitive types: - 變更序列化格式。Changing serialization formats. 需要版本相容序列化。Version-tolerant serialization is required. - 新增或移除私用執行個體欄位。Adding or removing private instance fields. 此風險變更類型的序列化格式，並中斷用戶端會使用反映的程式碼。This risks changing the serialization format of the type and breaking client code that uses reflection. - 變更類型的可序列化能力。Changing the serializability of a type. 非可序列化的型別可能會不成為可序列化，反之亦然。A non-serializable type may not be made serializable, and vice versa. - 擲回不同的例外狀況的方法。Throwing different exceptions from a method. - 除非成員定義引發這種可能性，並清楚地指出用戶端應如何處理未知的值，請變更方法的傳回值的範圍。Changing the range of a method's return values, unless the member definition raises this possibility and clearly indicates how clients should handle unknown values. - 修正大部分的 bug。Fixing most bugs. 型別的取用者將會依賴現有的行為。Consumers of the type will rely on the existing behavior. 之後的元件型別或成員會標示保證，它不能變更為或。After a component, type, or member is marked with the guarantee, it cannot be changed to either or . 交換類型通常是基本類型 (例如並.NET Framework 中) 和介面 (例如， ，和)，常用於公用介面。Typically, exchange types are the basic types (such as and in the .NET Framework) and interfaces (such as , , and ) that are commonly used in public interfaces. 交換類型可能會對外公開也會標有其他型別相容性。Exchange types may publicly expose only other types that are also marked with compatibility. 此外，exchange 類型不能取決於容易變更的 Windows Api 的行為。In addition, exchange types cannot depend on the behavior of Windows APIs that are prone to change. ## 元件的保證： 摘要Component Guarantees: A Summary 下表指出元件的特性和使用方式如何影響其相容性保障。The following table indicates how a component's characteristics and usage affect its compatibility guarantee. |元件特性Component characteristics|ExchangeExchange|穩定Stable|並排顯示Side-by-Side|無None| |-------------------------------|--------------|------------|--------------------|----------| |可以是元件之間的介面中該版本單獨使用。Can be used in interfaces between components that version independently.|YY|NN|NN|NN| |可以是 （私人） 組件使用該版本獨立。Can be used (privately) by an assembly that versions independently.|YY|YY|YY|NN| |在單一應用程式定義域可以有多個版本。Can have multiple versions in a single application domain.|NN|YY|YY|YY| |可以進行重大變更Can make breaking changes|NN|NN|YY|YY| |測試，以確定可以同時載入多個組件版本。Tested to make certain multiple versions of the assembly can be loaded together.|NN|NN|YY|NN| |可以在位置進行重大變更。Can make breaking changes in place.|NN|NN|NN|YY| |可以讓很安全不中斷服務的位置中的變更。Can make very safe non-breaking servicing changes in place.|YY|YY|YY|YY| ## 套用屬性Applying the Attribute 您可以套用組件、 類型或類型成員。You can apply the to an assembly, a type, or a type member. 它的應用程式為階層式。Its application is hierarchical. 也就是預設的情況下，就可以保證所定義組件層級之屬性的屬性會定義就可以保證所有類型的組件和這些類型的所有成員。That is, by default, the guarantee defined by the property of the attribute at the assembly level defines the guarantee of all types in the assembly and all members in those types. 同樣地，如果保證套用至類型中，依預設它也適用於類型的每個成員。Similarly, if the guarantee is applied to the type, by default it also applies to each member of the type. 此繼承的保證，可以藉由套用覆寫個別類型和類型成員。This inherited guarantee can be overridden by applying the to individual types and type members. 不過，覆寫預設的保證只會減弱保證;它們無法進行加強。However, guarantees that override the default can only weaken the guarantee; they cannot strengthen it. 例如，如果組件標示為保證，其型別和成員都有保證相容性，且會套用至類型或成員的組件中的任何其他保證會被忽略。For example, if an assembly is marked with the guarantee, its types and members have no compatibility guarantee, and any other guarantee that is applied to types or members in the assembly is ignored. ## 測試保證Testing the Guarantee 屬性傳回的成員列舉型別，會以標示屬性。The property returns a member of the enumeration, which is marked with the attribute. 這表示您應該測試您所感興趣的遮罩離開可能無法辨識的旗標的旗標。This means that you should test for the flag that you are interested in by masking away potentially unknown flags. 例如，下列範例會測試是否為型別會標示為。For example, the following example tests whether a type is marked as . [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.componentguaranteesattribute.class/cs/apply1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.componentguaranteesattribute.class/vb/apply1.vb#1)] 下列範例會測試是否為型別會標示為或。The following example tests whether a type is marked as or . [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.componentguaranteesattribute.class/cs/apply1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.componentguaranteesattribute.class/vb/apply1.vb#2)] 下列範例測試排除的型別會標示為(也就是未也)。The following example tests wither a type is marked as (that is, neither nor ). [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.componentguaranteesattribute.class/cs/apply1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesAttribute.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.componentguaranteesattribute.class/vb/apply1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Runtime.Versioning.ComponentGuaranteesOptions guarantees) cil managed

param.name: guarantees
param.span: 一個列舉值，指定多版相容性保障層級。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the level of compatibility that is guaranteed across multiple versions.

summary.span: 使用表示程式庫、型別或成員之多版相容性保障層級的值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a value that indicates a library, type, or member's guaranteed level of compatibility across multiple versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當具現化類別，值`guarantees`參數指派給屬性。When the class is instantiated, the value of the `guarantees` parameter is assigned to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Guarantees As ComponentGuaranteesOptions

summary.span: 取得值，該值表示應用在多個版本中的程式庫、型別或型別成員之相容性保障層級。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the guaranteed level of compatibility of a library, type, or type member that spans multiple versions.

value.span: 一個列舉值，指定多版相容性保障層級。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the level of compatibility that is guaranteed across multiple versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性會對應至`guarantees`參數建構函式。The value of the property corresponds to the `guarantees` parameter of the constructor.
